BLOG IMPOSSIBLE LIST ABOUT PORTFOLIO RESUME

MY IMPOSSIBLE LIST

Lots of people have lots of goals; and lots of people have lots of goals that don't actually accomplish in their lives. I have my own little notebook I carry along with me all the time, yet I just can't seem to find the urge to do it like NOW. Joel Runyon created the world's first impossible list. In short, the impossible list is an ever-evolving list of experiences that build upon each other, help others as well as yourself, and implore you to take action. Welcome to my impossible list, which is always updating, like myself

Gym goals

  • Bench 80kg100kg
  • Shoulder press 40kg 60kg
  • Squat 100kg
  • Run a marathon

    • Skill goals
  • Pick up programming Ruby
  • Join a startup with programming
  • Write a sci-fi novel

    • Travel goals

  • India
  • Antartica
  • Puerto Rico (after listening to Des-pa-cito)

    • Projects in my mind

  • Smart Mirror with Raspberry Pi
  • Upgrading the robotic arm with hydraulics...
  • Build the jet engine and mount it on my bicycle

    • Site built on Jekyll and hosted on Github
